user_activity_frequency.description: Normalized count of total interactions performed by a user.
user_activity_frequency.logic: Group by user_id and count item_id, then MinMax scaled to [0,1]

avg_rating_per_user.description: Normalized average rating given by a user across all rated items.
avg_rating_per_user.logic: Group by user_id and compute mean of rating, then MinMax scaled to [0,1]

avg_rating_per_item.description: Normalized average rating received by an item.
avg_rating_per_item.logic: Group by item_id and compute mean of rating, then MinMax scaled to [0,1]

session_unique_items.description: Normalized number of distinct items interacted with in a session.
session_unique_items.logic: Group by session_id and count unique item_id, then MinMax scaled to [0,1]

session_interaction_count.description: Normalized total number of interactions within a session.
session_interaction_count.logic: Group by session_id and count item_id, then MinMax scaled to [0,1]

popularity_score.description: Normalized popularity score of the product.
popularity_score.logic: Already provided between 0 and 1, retained as-is

is_rating_event.description: Flag indicating whether the interaction is a rating event.

price_bucket_*.description: One-hot encoded price bucket features (low, medium, high, premium).
price_bucket_*.logic: Price bucket created using pd.cut, then one-hot encoded

feature_store.versioning: Each pipeline run appends a new batch of feature rows. Feature CSV files are timestamped and represent versioned snapshots.
feature_store.ownership: Automatically generated by feature engineering pipeline
